title: Ranked 5s queue returns during scheduled windows

replies.body: anyone else hate these times ;/
It's a bit late for NZ players. 10pm on weekdays isn't the best for us.
For anyone wondering, looks like only the times for NA have been confirmed ATM. Even EUW still has the NA schedule. **Riot** should update us on the OCE schedule sometime during this patch.

There was a mistake in the title bar. Thanks for flagging that.

The times listed above are for OCE. It's 8pm - 11:59pm AEST weekdays and 6pm - 11:59pm AEST weekends.

Can these times be a bit earlier? Now that the season is coming to a close it would be helpful for NZ players if its a bit earlier so we have more of a chance of getting those season rewards coming up .{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Wouldnt you have more players if you made it earlier in the day. Then people from nz would be able to play easier on the weekdays.
Exactly this. I have a few friends who would want to ranked team but its so late it makes it hard to organise. Even an hour or more earlier would be helpful.
Why not all day over the weekend? and during week nights more 5pm on wards?
Umm, rito pls fix this. My friends and i are from nz. This schedule of time is very awkward, 2 hours back for each will help us. thanks!
{{champion:78}}

ok so ranked 5s is back which is great
but if someone was to say for example be bronze as soloq player
but their team is gold/plat which tier would show up? wouldnt be fair for those soloq players who work hard to see players who are below gold who have that high tier emblem like last time can this be rectified?
im not ranked as solo queue, but in a team im bv, so hovering the mouse over my name in chat it comes up as bv, but if you got to my profile itll show you individual rankings.
With regards to emblem, they're specific to Dynamic Queue (non-Ranked Teams 5v5 queue). Ranked Teams 5v5 ranks will appear separate from the Dynamic Queue rank.
Are there any rewards for successful ranked team ?

> [{quoted}](name=pandareturn,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=iRsxPrgg,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-07-01T14:37:02.184+0000)
>
> Are there any rewards for successful ranked team ?

Sorry for the late response! Ranked rewards will be given for your Ranked Team rank as well as your Dynamic Queue rank (: If you have any more questions, I'd be happy to answer them!
These times are seriously stupid. have the people on my friends list and ranked team are from New Zealand, and we cant even pay till weekend.
Not very NZ friendly :P 10pm is pretty hard to play
Is the rank 5 queue out? Because its already 8:30pm :/ Just wondering if its already out
Wondering why NA times have 6 hour intervals , but we only have 4. Can't riot make it like 6pm-12am?
This still doesn't fix the all important question of when is solo Q coming back?!?!?!?

VERY IMPORTANT QUESTION I REALLY WANNA KNOW 

Does this mean teamrank is coming back and is this forever or just for a while and why did they get rid of teamrank??? soz i really wanna know
